promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a massive simple orca water-type pokemon with white skin. It can be found in river-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, water or orca. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Polarivera, a a massive simple orca water-type pokemon. It can be found in river-like environments It has the following abilities: Bubblebeam, Icicle. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "orca", "water" or "Polarivera". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of water-type pokemon, orca-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, sparkling blue background
generatedDescription: Found in riverine habitats, this aquatic giant commands respect using Bubblebeam and Icicle. It navigates icy currents effortlessly.
